items.sentence: Mary told me that she thought that Tom was handsome.
I wanted Tom to do that, but he told me he wouldn't.
The company that Tom used to work for went bankrupt.
Would you like to learn a few useful French phrases?
You have to call the doctor and make an appointment.
We waited a reasonable amount of time and then left.
When I came home, I saw Tom passed out on the floor.
Tom and Mary did their best to raise their children.
Wouldn't it be better to ask Tom's permission first?
Tom works at the same company as you do, doesn't he?
